meanings.definition: The quality or state of being smutty.
meanings.sent1: The smuttinesses of the old chimney made it look dirty and black.
meanings.sent2: I cleaned the windows to remove the smuttinesses that had accumulated over time.
meanings.sent3: The smuttinesses on the car's windshield made it hard to see through.
meanings.sent4: Her hands were covered in smuttinesses after working in the coal mine all day.
meanings.sent5: The smuttinesses of the city air made it difficult to breathe.

meanings.definition: The presence of smut or dirt.
meanings.sent1: The farmer noticed the smuttinesses on the wheat grains.
meanings.sent2: After playing outside, the children's clothes were covered in smuttinesses.
meanings.sent3: The dog rolled around in the mud, adding to the smuttinesses of its fur.
meanings.sent4: The old book had pages yellowed with age and smuttinesses.
meanings.sent5: The smuttinesses on the kitchen floor needed to be scrubbed clean.

meanings.sent1: The movie was rated R due to its smuttinesses scenes.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked by the smuttinesses language used in the play.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's jokes crossed the line into smuttinesses territory.
meanings.sent4: The magazine cover promised smuttinesses stories inside.
meanings.sent5: The smuttinesses content of the website was not suitable for children.
